thread.title: Police release video of Johnny Manziel traffic stop

title: Police release video of Johnny Manziel traffic stop
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Police release video of Johnny Manziel traffic stop Former Aggie quarterback Johnny Manziel, who now plays for the Cleveland Browns, was stopped by police a week ago in Avon, Ohio. Post to Facebook Police release video of Johnny Manziel traffic stop Former Aggie quarterback Johnny Manziel, who now plays for the Cleveland Browns, was stopped by police a week ago in Avon, Ohio.   KHOU.com: http://on.khou.com/1RRVKMP   Join the Conversation To   Police release video of Johnny Manziel traffic stop KHOU Staff, KHOU.com 10:51 a.m. CDT October 19, 2015 Manziel was stopped by police after argument with girlfriend Manziel traffic stop video released to the media (Photo: PD) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Former Aggie quarterback Johnny Manziel, who now plays for the Cleveland Browns, was stopped by police a week ago in Avon, Ohio. 
Witnesses said he was driving at a high speed on the shoulder trying to pass another vehicle. 
They say Manziel's girlfriend, Colleen Crowley, was trying to get out of the vehicle and he pulled her back in. 
When police pulled them over, Manziel admitted they'd been drinking earlier in the day.
